intro: The offshore hydrogen highlight of the year — an exclusive members' gathering with leading figures from industry, politics, and science. Large enough to shape the sector, intimate enough for trust. At extraordinary locations — on the water and beyond.

abschnitte.text: The AquaSummit brings together the decision-makers of the offshore hydrogen economy once a year. Keynotes, panels and fireside chats alternate with intensive networking — in a setting that fosters openness and trust.

Extraordinary places create extraordinary conversations. The AquaSummit takes place at locations that surprise — industrial, maritime, inspiring. In 2025, a historic workshop hall with light installations and maritime character.

Keynotes from industry leaders, political impulses, technological deep dives and an award ceremony for outstanding contributions to the offshore hydrogen economy. Rounded off by an evening programme with networking in a special atmosphere.

bilder.alt: AquaSummit Venue — View across the event hall
